section.description: High style meets the high life in a living room with space to spare and sights to sigh over.
Living in the now is good. Living in the wow is even better.
Your bedroom comes with lots of built-in secrets.
Bask in the light let in by your generous windows, be it from sun, stars or skyline.
What's the difference between ordinary and extraordinary? The word "extra." And this kitchen has lots of extras.
With a bedroom as stunning as this, you'll think you're dreaming with your eyes open.
You'll be experiencing a room with an exceptional view – both inside and out – which includes a flirty, translucent-walled Peek-a-Boo Loo.
We've showered your bathroom with every indulgent detail you can dream up.
Custom-designed Graft mirror and medicine cabinet. Edge-lit mirror.
One of the hottest places for entertainment in New York is now right in your home.
